CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Term_Transfer_Stopped__c )) , "Term/Transfer Stopped"&BR()& ( IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"), "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"&BR(),"")&
IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"), "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"&BR(),"")&
IF(ISPICKVAL(SH_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Postponed Termination"), "Client Postponed Termination"&BR(),"")&
IF(ISPICKVAL(SH_CPR_Resolution__c, "Client Saved"), "Client Saved - Safe Harbor Call"&BR(),"")&
IF( Flag_Notes_as_Important__c ==True, "See Termination Milestone Notes"&BR(), "")
) , ( IF( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy__c , "Yes") && ISBLANK( Discrepancy_Closed_Date__c ) , "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy"&BR(), "") & IF( Last_Check_Date__c > Today(), "Future Last Check Date"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_NPR_Callout_Sent_to_CPR__c )) && ISBLANK( Retention_Call_Completed__c ) , "CPR NPR Callout"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_SH_Callout_Sent_to_CPR__c )) && ISBLANK( CPR_SH_Compliance_Call_Completed__c ), "CPR Safe Harbor Call"&BR(),"") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Sent_to_LDPS__c )) && ( ISBLANK( ROE_Completed_Date__c )&& ISBLANK( ROE_Returned_Date__c )), "Process ROE's"&BR(),"") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Sent_to_Service_Support__c )) && ISBLANK( Forfeiture_Allocation_Completed_Attached__c ),"Prepare Forfeiture Allocation"&BR(),"") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Forfeitures_Send_to_CAM__c )) && ISBLANK( Forfeiture_Trade_Date__c ), "Trade Forfeiture Account"&BR(),"")& IF( Flag_Notes_as_Important__c ==True, "See Termination Milestone Notes"&BR(), "")& IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Send_to_CAM_to_Trade_Holding_Acct__c )) && ISBLANK( Holding_Account_Trade_Date__c ), "Trade Holding Account "&BR(),"")& IF((Unresolved_Allocation__c ) && (ISBLANK ( Allocation_Issue_Resolved__c )), "Unresolved Allocation Issue" &BR(),"")& IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Email_Sent_to_Guided_Choice__c )) && ISBLANK( Managed_Accounts_Resolved__c ), "Managed Accounts Issue"&BR(),"") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Bank_Detail_Issue_Sent_to_Audit__c )) && ISBLANK( Bank_Detail_Issue_Resolved__c ), "Bank Detail Issue"&BR(),"") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Alerts_Sent_to_CAT__c )) && ISBLANK( Alerts_Resolved__c ), "Clear Outstanding Alerts"&BR(),"") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Contributions_on_Hold_Sent_to_CAT__c )) && ISBLANK( Contributions_on_Hold_Resolved__c ), "Contributions on Hold"&BR(),"") & IF(ISPICKVAL (Holding_Account_Balance__c, "Yes") && ISBLANK( Send_to_CAM_to_Trade_Holding_Acct__c), "Holding Account Balance"&BR(),"")& IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"), "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"&BR(),"")& IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"), "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"&BR(),"")& IF(ISPICKVAL(SH_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Postponed Termination"), "Client Postponed Termination"&BR(),"")& IF(ISPICKVAL(SH_CPR_Resolution__c, "Client Saved"), "Client Saved - Safe Harbor Call"&BR(),"") ) )
CustomField.label: Pending Termination Tasks
